name: 2D Space Shooter (RishiLakhani)
description:
A simple 2D space shooting game. Contains 3 levels in which you have to kill all the enemies in order to win the game. Few major changes made are:

  1. Added pause button at top right corner.
  2. Made a Survival Mode in which you can keep killing as many enemies as you can in order to create a high score.
  3. Added a background to the main menu.

I hope you enjoy the game ;-).
